title: The Favorites - NBA Draft Betting
itunes:title: The Favorites - NBA Draft Betting
description:
The Warriors have again been crowned as NBA Champions, so now gamblers can turn their attention to the NBA event of the summer: the NBA Draft! Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter welcome on their colleagues Matt Moore and Brandon Anderson to discuss the ways they are approaching betting the event, with loads of intrigue -- and value -- remaining for the top 3 picks and beyond. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
